title: Database Agent
description: An autonomous agent through which the user has the ability to run complex queries to fetch data, run analyses and generate graphs across multiple data repositories of varying kinds.
longDescription: Developed an agentic framework through which a user is able to interact with his data repositories in natural language. SQL queries are generated by the systme to access the databaes(s). The system is capable of autonomously searching for information through the repository to find statistically significant information that could be useful to the user. This project is powered by LLMs through the LangGraph framework. It allows for business professionals to understand raw information in a low-level without the need for technical expertise as the system is capable of displaying information in a user-friendly manner through various charts and diagrams.
highlights: Multi-Turn Conversational and Autonomous Agent
Answers natural language questions based on tabular data using charts, graphs, and Markdown text
Ability to choose models for different stages of system

title: Nexus Ledger Flutter Application
description: A user-friendly finance tracking application that helps you stay ahead of your financial goals.
longDescription: Developed an encrypted finance tracking application with Flutter. The platform allows users to securely manage budgets, categorize expenses, and track transactions and generate reports, along with importing and exporting data.
highlights: Account management with multiple account types
Transaction tracking with categories and tags
Budget creation and spending analysis
Data import/export in JSON format
PDF report generation

title: Loan Default Prediction Model
description: The model was created to compete in Coursera's Dataset Challenge. It was ranked in the 88th percentile.
longDescription: Engineered a predictive model using Python and Scikit-learn to identify potential loan defaults for a Coursera competition. Achieved a top 12% ranking (88th percentile) through rigorous feature engineering and model tuning.
highlights: Ranked in the 88th percentile in Coursera's Dataset Challenge
Uses XGBoost for decision tree modeling
Data cleaning and preprocessing

title: Code Generation Approach for Question Answering over Tabular Data
description: A research project that explores a code generation approach for question answering over tabular data.
longDescription: Developed a code generation pipeline that translates natural language questions into executable Python (pandas) code for data retrieval from a single table. This project utilizes LLMs to empower non-technical users to query tabular data directly, eliminating the need to write SQL.
highlights: Obtained 67% accuracy in the SemEval 2025 Task 8 competition
Answer natural language questions based on tabular data
Published in ACL Association for Computational Linguistics 2025

title: Studize Mobile App
description: This project is a minature calendar application facilitating an easy way to manage academic tasks and schedules.
longDescription: This is a front-end mobile app developed using Flutter, designed to help students manage their academic tasks and schedules efficiently. It features a user-friendly interface with the ability to view their academic calendar and manage study sessions.
highlights: Calendar view allows for the viewing of projects

title: VITCL Flutter Application
description: This project aims to create a platform through which players from VIT could register and play chess seamlessly.
longDescription: This is a front-end mobile app developed using Flutter, designed to facilitate chess players from VIT to register and play games seamlessly. The app provides a user-friendly interface for players to manage their profiles and participate in chess matches.
highlights: User-friendly interface for chess players
Allows registration and participation in chess matches
Able to view upcoming matches and results

title: My Portfolio Website
description: This is a personal portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills.
longDescription: This is a front-end web application developed using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, designed to showcase my projects and skills in a visually appealing manner. The website features a clean and modern design, with sections for my work, skills, and contact information.
highlights: Showcases my projects and skills
Clean and modern design
Sections for work, skills, and contact information

title: Rails store app
description: A basic project created by following the Ruby on Rails tutorial. It is a simple store application that allows users to browse products and add them to their cart.
longDescription: This is a basic web application developed using Ruby on Rails, designed to serve as a simple store application. It allows users to browse products, add them to their cart, and manage their orders. The application features a clean and intuitive interface for easy navigation.
highlights: Provides a platform for VIT chess players
Clean and modern design
Sections for viewing chess news and ongoing games

title: VIT Chess
description: This project which I created with my friend, aims to create a platform through which players from VIT could view chess news, and games of players.
longDescription: This is a front-end web application developed using React.js, designed to provide VIT chess players with a platform to view chess news and games of players. The application features a user-friendly interface that allows users to stay updated with the latest chess news and view ongoing games.
highlights: Provides a platform for VIT chess players
Clean and modern design
Sections for viewing chess news and ongoing games

title: A CLI Chat Application for PAN connected devices
description: This project is a command-line interface chat application that allows users to communicate over a Personal Area Network (PAN).
longDescription: This is a command-line interface chat application developed using Python, designed to allow users to communicate over a Personal Area Network (PAN). The application features a simple and intuitive interface that enables users to send and receive messages seamlessly.
highlights: Two way simplex communication
